homemakers.name: Anjali Sharma
homemakers.quote: Homemade goodness that satisfies your cravings

dishes.name: Idli sambar and coconut chutney
dishes.description: A South Indian trio that brings together fluffy rice cakes, flavorful lentil stew, and creamy coconut chutney. A symphony of tastes in every bite!

dishes.name: Upma with chutney and sambar
dishes.description: A South Indian delight that harmonizes the wholesome goodness of semolina, zesty chutney, and flavorful sambar. A taste of comfort and tradition in every mouthful!

dishes.name: Aloo Paratha and Tomato Chutney
dishes.description: Crispy, golden parathas embrace a spiced potato filling, while the tangy tomato chutney adds a delightful twist. A delectable combination that's sure to satisfy your cravings.

dishes.name: Puri with Aloo Sabji
dishes.description: Crispy, fluffy, and satisfying, paired with a flavorful potato curry. A symphony of textures and flavors to tantalize your taste buds.

dishes.name: Poha
dishes.description: Fluffy flattened rice sautéed with spices, herbs, and a hint of lemon, offering a delightful and quick Breakfast option with a burst of flavors.

dishes.name: Dosa
dishes.description: South India's crispy marvel, a thin, golden delight that pairs perfectly with spiced potatoes. A tasty crunch in every bite.

dishes.name: Moong Dal Chilla
dishes.description: Wholesome and savory, these lentil pancakes are a healthy, protein-packed delight, perfect for a satisfying Breakfast or snack.

dishes.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Chapattis
dishes.description: Paneer cubes simmered in a rich tomato-based gravy with a hint of cream and aromatic spices. Served with soft chapattis. A North Indian favorite that's indulgent and satisfying.

dishes.name: Mutton Biryani
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender mutton pieces and aromatic spices. A delicious and aromatic biryani. Served with raita and salad.

dishes.name: Palak Paneer with Roti
dishes.description: Cubes of paneer in a creamy spinach gravy, seasoned with Indian spices. Served with soft rotis. A wholesome and vegetarian delight that's rich in flavor and nutrients.

dishes.name: Vegetable Pulao with Raita
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with a medley of vegetables and aromatic spices. Served with cooling raita. A vegetarian pulao that's both flavorful and satisfying.

dishes.name: Aloo Gobi with Parathas
dishes.description: A comforting blend of potatoes and cauliflower, sautéed with spices and herbs. Served with fresh, hot parathas. A homely and satisfying dish that's full of flavor.

dishes.name: Tandoori Chicken with Rice
dishes.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked to perfection in a tandoor. Served with fragrant basmati rice, naan, and a side of mint chutney. A smoky and flavorful dish that's a delight for meat lovers.

dishes.name: Veg Biryani with Raita
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with a medley of vegetables and aromatic spices. Served with cooling raita. A vegetarian biryani that's a burst of flavors and textures.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken with Naan
dishes.description: Tender chicken pieces simmered in a rich tomato-based gravy with a hint of cream and aromatic spices. Served with soft naan. A North Indian classic that's indulgent and savory.

dishes.name: Mixed Vegetable Curry with Roti
dishes.description: A flavorful medley of mixed vegetables in a spiced curry. Served with soft rotis. A wholesome vegetarian meal that's perfect for Lunch.

dishes.name: Veg Fried Rice with Manchurian
dishes.description: Fragrant fried rice, accompanied by vegetable Manchurian. A delightful fusion of Indian and Chinese flavors.

dishes.name: Dal Tadka with Jeera Rice
dishes.description: Yellow lentils cooked with spices and tempered with aromatic ghee. Served with cumin-flavored rice. A comforting and satisfying vegetarian meal.

dishes.name: Fish Curry with Steamed Rice
dishes.description: Fish cooked in a spicy and tangy curry, served with steamed rice. A coastal delight for seafood enthusiasts.

dishes.name: Malai Kofta with Chapattis
dishes.description: Deep-fried paneer and vegetable dumplings served in a creamy and rich cashew-based gravy, flavored with aromatic spices along with chapattis

dishes.name: Dal Makhni with naan
dishes.description: A creamy and flavorful lentil curry made with a combination of black lentils (urad dal) and kidney beans (rajma), simmered in a rich tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices.

homemakers.name: Aisha Khan
homemakers.quote: Crafting flavors with love and passion

dishes.name: Aloo Paratha
dishes.description: Flatbread stuffed with a spiced potato mixture, served with yogurt and butter.

dishes.name: Poha
dishes.description: A light and wholesome dish made with flattened rice, onions, peanuts, and spices.

dishes.name: Amritsari Kulcha
dishes.description: Flatbread stuffed with a spiced potato filling, served with chole (spicy chickpeas).

dishes.name: Gobhi Paratha
dishes.description: Flatbread stuffed with spiced cauliflower.

dishes.name: Stuffed Besan Cheela
dishes.description: Savory pancakes with a spiced paneer filling.

dishes.name: Lassi and Masala Omelet
dishes.description: Sweetened yogurt drink paired with a spiced omelet.

dishes.name: Puri Halwa
dishes.description: Deep-fried puffy bread served with a sweet semolina pudding.

dishes.name: Chana Masala with Basmati Rice
dishes.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with aromatic basmati rice. Include a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Rajma Chawal with Curd/Raita
dishes.description: Kidney beans in a savory curry, served with basmati rice and a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Kadhi Pakora with Rice
dishes.description: Yogurt-based curry with gram flour dumplings, served with rice. Include a side of raita.

dishes.name: Sarson Ka Saag with Makki Di Roti and Raita
dishes.description: Mustard greens curry with cornflour flatbread and a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Bharwan Baingan with Rice
dishes.description: Stuffed eggplants in a tangy gravy served with rice. Include a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Baingan Bharta with Roti and Raita
dishes.description: Roasted and mashed eggplant served with whole-wheat roti and a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Mixed Vegetable Curry with Rice and Raita
dishes.description: A medley of vegetables served with rice and a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Saag Paneer with Roti
dishes.description: Creamy spinach with paneer, served with whole wheat roti.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani) with Naan
dishes.description: Rich chicken in a buttery tomato sauce, perfect with fluffy naan.

dishes.name: Dal Makhani with Roti
dishes.description: Creamy lentils with whole wheat roti.

dishes.name: Tandoori Chicken with Naan
dishes.description: Yogurt and spice marinated chicken served with naan.

dishes.name: Punjabi Chole Bhature
dishes.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried, fluffy bread.

dishes.name: Amritsari Machli with Rice
dishes.description: Crispy, batter-fried fish with basmati rice.

dishes.name: Shahi Paneer with Naan
dishes.description: Rich and creamy paneer with naan.

homemakers.name: Nandini Verma
homemakers.quote: Indulge in the essence of homemade delicacies

dishes.name: Mithe Chawal (Sweet Rice)
dishes.description: Flavored rice cooked with saffron, nuts, and a touch of sweetness.

dishes.name: Bajra Aloo Paratha
dishes.description: Flatbread stuffed with pearl millet and spiced potato filling.

dishes.name: Besan Masala Roti
dishes.description: Flatbread made with gram flour and spices, served with yogurt.

dishes.name: Dalia Khichdi
dishes.description: Savory porridge made with cracked wheat (dalia), vegetables, and spices.

dishes.name: Methi Paratha
dishes.description: Flatbread with a flavorful fenugreek leaf filling.

dishes.name: Poha
dishes.description: Light and wholesome dish made with flattened rice, onions, peanuts, and spices.

dishes.name: Churma
dishes.description: Traditional sweet dish made with crumbled roti, ghee, and jaggery or sugar.

dishes.name: Gajar Methi Sabzi with Roti and Raita
dishes.description: Carrots and fenugreek leaves cooked in a spiced tomato-onion base, served with whole wheat roti and curd or raita.

dishes.name: Kadhi Pakora with Rice and Raita
dishes.description: Yogurt-based curry with gram flour dumplings, served with rice and a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Mixed Dal with Rice and Raita
dishes.description: A hearty mix of lentils cooked with spices, served with rice and curd or raita.

dishes.name: Kachri ki Sabzi with Roti and Raita
dishes.description: Dried, wild cucumber cooked in a tangy spice mix, served with roti and curd or raita.

dishes.name: Singri ki Sabzi with Bajra Roti and Raita
dishes.description: Dried beans and berries in a tangy gravy, enjoyed with pearl millet roti (bajra roti) and a side of raita.

dishes.name: Gobhi Matar with Rice and Raita
dishes.description: Cauliflower and peas in a spiced tomato gravy, with basmati rice and curd or raita.

dishes.name: Kadhi Pakora with Rice and Raita
dishes.description: Yogurt-based curry with gram flour dumplings, served with rice and a side of curd or raita.

dishes.name: Hara Chana Masala with Rice
dishes.description: Fresh green chickpeas cooked in a savory, spicy gravy, served with basmati rice.

dishes.name: Bhindi Masala with Roti
dishes.description: Okra (bhindi) cooked in a flavorful onion-tomato base and spices, served with whole wheat roti.

dishes.name: Bathua Raita with Roti
dishes.description: Yogurt-based dip with fresh bathua greens (Chenopodium), served with roti.

dishes.name: Gatte ki Sabzi with Rice
dishes.description: Gram flour dumplings in a yogurt-based, spiced gravy, served with basmati rice.

dishes.name: Palak Paneer with Roti
dishes.description: Creamy spinach with paneer, served with whole wheat roti

dishes.name: Baingan Bharta with Roti
dishes.description: Roasted and mashed eggplant, with whole-wheat roti.

dishes.name: Besan Gatta Curry with Roti
dishes.description: Gram flour dumplings in a tangy yogurt gravy, with whole wheat roti.

homemakers.name: Lakshmi Patel
homemakers.quote: Authentic homemade flavors delivered with love

dishes.name: Bajre ki Raab
dishes.description: A warm and nourishing porridge made with pearl millet flour, buttermilk, and spices.

dishes.name: Moong Dal Chilla
dishes.description: Savory pancakes made with a spiced moong dal (yellow lentil) batter.

dishes.name: Pyaz Kachori
dishes.description: Deep-fried, flaky pastry filled with a spicy onion mixture.

dishes.name: Methi Bajra Poori
dishes.description: Deep-fried bread made with pearl millet flour and fenugreek leaves.

dishes.name: Besan ka Cheela
dishes.description: Savory pancakes made with gram flour (besan), yogurt, and spices.

dishes.name: Mirchi Vada
dishes.description: Large green chilies stuffed with a spiced potato filling and batter-fried.

dishes.name: Mawa Kachori
dishes.description: Pastry filled with sweetened khoya (reduced milk solids) and nuts.

dishes.name: Dal Baati Churma
dishes.description: The quintessential Rajasthani dish! Hard wheat rolls (baati) baked traditionally in a pit, served with panchmel dal (mix of five lentils) and sweet churma (crumbled sweet bread).

dishes.name: Rajasthani Kadhi with Rice
dishes.description: Flavorful yogurt-based spiced curry with gram flour dumplings (pakoras), served with steamed rice.

dishes.name: Panchkuta Sabzi
dishes.description: A unique dish blending five desert vegetables in a spiced preparation. Serve with roti or rice.

dishes.name: Guvar Phali ki Sabzi with Rice
dishes.description: Cluster beans in a tangy and flavorful gravy, enjoyed with rice.

dishes.name: Papad Mangodi ki Sabzi with Rice
dishes.description: A lentil and sun-dried papad (spicy wafers) curry with tangy dried mango, served with rice.

dishes.name: Laal Maas with Rice
dishes.description: A fiery mutton curry (substitute soy chunks or paneer for a vegetarian version), enjoyed with rice.

dishes.name: Ghevar
dishes.description: A sweet disc-shaped delicacy made with flour, soaked in sugar syrup. (Enjoy as a special treat)

dishes.name: Ker Sangri ki Sabzi with Bajra Roti
dishes.description: Dried beans and berries cooked in a tangy and flavorful gravy. Enjoy with pearl millet roti.

dishes.name: Gatte ki Sabzi with Roti
dishes.description: Besan (gram flour) dumplings simmered in a rich, yogurt-based gravy, perfectly paired with roti.

dishes.name: Matar Paneer with Roti
dishes.description: Green peas and paneer cubes cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy, served with roti.

dishes.name: Bhindi Masala with Roti
dishes.description: Okra cooked in a traditional Rajasthani spice blend, paired with roti.

dishes.name: Aloo Methi Sabzi with Roti
dishes.description: Simple yet delicious curry of potatoes and fenugreek leaves, paired with roti.

dishes.name: Dahi Bhindi with Roti
dishes.description: Okra cooked in a creamy yogurt-based gravy, enjoyed with roti.

dishes.name: Chana Masala with Roti
dishes.description: Hearty, spiced chickpea curry served with roti

homemakers.name: Sakshi Iyer
homemakers.quote: Unleashing flavors that ignite your taste buds

dishes.name: Luchi and Alur Dom
dishes.description: Fluffy, deep-fried flatbreads (luchi) served with a simple and comforting potato curry (alur dom).

dishes.name: Radhaballavi and Cholar Dal
dishes.description: Stuffed lentil flatbread (radhaballavi) accompanied by a mildly spiced cholar dal.

dishes.name: Muri Ghonto
dishes.description: A quick and comforting puffed rice dish flavored with fish, coconut, and vegetables.

dishes.name: Koraishutir Kochuri and Aloor Torkari
dishes.description: Flaky flatbreads stuffed with green peas (koraishutir kochuri) served with a spicy potato curry (aloor torkari).

dishes.name: Doodh Poha
dishes.description: Flattened rice softened in milk with sugar and nuts, a simple and delicious start to the day.

dishes.name: Vegetable Chop with Ghugni
dishes.description: Spiced vegetable croquettes paired with dried yellow peas in a flavorful curry.

dishes.name: Mishti Doi
dishes.description: Sweetened, set yogurt - a staple Bengali dessert for breakfast.

dishes.name: Shukto with Rice
dishes.description: A medley of bitter and sweet vegetables cooked in a lightly spiced sauce, served with a mound of steamed rice.

dishes.name: Macher Jhol with Rice
dishes.description: Bengali-style fish curry with potatoes in a light, flavorful broth, a classic with rice.

dishes.name: Chhanar Dalna with Rice
dishes.description: Soft paneer cubes in a fragrant, spiced gravy, best enjoyed with rice.

dishes.name: Moong Dal with Rice and Begun Bhaja
dishes.description: Yellow lentil dal with fried eggplant slices, served with rice for a wholesome meal.

dishes.name: Maach Bhaja with Rice and Dal
dishes.description: Pan-fried fish with simple lentil dal and steamed rice.

dishes.name: Kosha Mangsho with Luchi
dishes.description: Bengali-style mutton curry (substitute paneer for a vegetarian version) served with luchi.

dishes.name: Pulao with Vegetable Curry
dishes.description: Fragrant rice with spices and vegetables.

dishes.name: Cholar Dal with Roti
dishes.description: Creamy yellow lentils delicately spiced, ideal with simple roti.

dishes.name: Dhokar Dalna with Roti
dishes.description: Spiced lentil cakes cooked in a flavorful tomato-based curry, served with roti.

dishes.name: Aloo Posto with Roti
dishes.description: Savory poppy seed and potato curry with a hint of sweetness, enjoyed with roti.

dishes.name: Potoler Dolma with Roti
dishes.description: Stuffed pointed gourd in a delicately spiced yogurt gravy, accompanied by roti.

dishes.name: Chana Masala with Luchi
dishes.description: Spicy chickpea curry paired with the Bengali favourite, fluffy luchi.

dishes.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Roti
dishes.description: Silky paneer in a rich tomato-butter sauce, served with roti.

dishes.name: Rosogolla and Sandesh
dishes.description: Delight in these iconic Bengali sweets – spongy milk dumplings bathed in syrup (rosogolla) and sweet, delicate cottage cheese balls (sandesh).

dishes.description: Deep-fried, lentil stuffed puris paired with a spicy potato curry.

dishes.description: Spicy and flavorful chickpea curry accompanied by large, deep-fried bhatura bread.

dishes.name: Dal Paratha
dishes.description: Layered whole wheat flatbread stuffed with flavorful spiced lentils.

dishes.description: Savory, spicy chickpeas in a thick tomato-based gravy, served with aromatic basmati rice.

dishes.description: Flavorful rice dish cooked with a medley of vegetables and spices.

dishes.description: A rich and creamy cottage cheese dish in a tomato-cashew gravy, perfect with soft and fluffy naan.

homemakers.name: Jyoti Yadav
homemakers.quote: Savor the rich and aromatic flavors of North Indian and Mughlai cuisine

dishes.name: Idli sambar and coconut chutney
dishes.description: A South Indian trio that brings together fluffy rice cakes, flavorful lentil stew, and creamy coconut chutney. A symphony of tastes in every bite!

dishes.name: Upma with chutney and sambar
dishes.description: A South Indian delight that harmonizes the wholesome goodness of semolina, zesty chutney, and flavorful sambar. A taste of comfort and tradition in every mouthful!

dishes.name: Aloo Paratha and Tomato Chutney
dishes.description: Crispy, golden parathas embrace a spiced potato filling, while the tangy tomato chutney adds a delightful twist. A delectable combination that's sure to satisfy your cravings.

dishes.name: Puri with Aloo Sabji
dishes.description: Crispy, fluffy, and satisfying, paired with a flavorful potato curry. A symphony of textures and flavors to tantalize your taste buds.

dishes.name: Poha
dishes.description: Fluffy flattened rice sautéed with spices, herbs, and a hint of lemon, offering a delightful and quick Breakfast option with a burst of flavors.

dishes.name: Dosa
dishes.description: South India's crispy marvel, a thin, golden delight that pairs perfectly with spiced potatoes. A tasty crunch in every bite.

dishes.name: Moong Dal Chilla
dishes.description: Wholesome and savory, these lentil pancakes are a healthy, protein-packed delight, perfect for a satisfying Breakfast or snack.

dishes.name: Paneer Butter Masala with Chapattis
dishes.description: Paneer cubes simmered in a rich tomato-based gravy with a hint of cream and aromatic spices. Served with soft chapattis. A North Indian favorite that's indulgent and satisfying.

dishes.name: Mutton Biryani
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender mutton pieces and aromatic spices. A delicious and aromatic biryani. Served with raita and salad.

dishes.name: Palak Paneer with Roti
dishes.description: Cubes of paneer in a creamy spinach gravy, seasoned with Indian spices. Served with soft rotis. A wholesome and vegetarian delight that's rich in flavor and nutrients.

dishes.name: Vegetable Pulao with Raita
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with a medley of vegetables and aromatic spices. Served with cooling raita. A vegetarian pulao that's both flavorful and satisfying.

dishes.name: Aloo Gobi with Parathas
dishes.description: A comforting blend of potatoes and cauliflower, sautéed with spices and herbs. Served with fresh, hot parathas. A homely and satisfying dish that's full of flavor.

dishes.name: Tandoori Chicken with Rice
dishes.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked to perfection in a tandoor. Served with fragrant basmati rice, naan, and a side of mint chutney. A smoky and flavorful dish that's a delight for meat lovers.

dishes.name: Veg Biryani with Raita
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with a medley of vegetables and aromatic spices. Served with cooling raita. A vegetarian biryani that's a burst of flavors and textures.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken with Naan
dishes.description: Tender chicken pieces simmered in a rich tomato-based gravy with a hint of cream and aromatic spices. Served with soft naan. A North Indian classic that's indulgent and savory.

dishes.name: Mixed Vegetable Curry with Roti
dishes.description: A flavorful medley of mixed vegetables in a spiced curry. Served with soft rotis. A wholesome vegetarian meal that's perfect for Lunch.

dishes.name: Veg Fried Rice with Manchurian
dishes.description: Fragrant fried rice, accompanied by vegetable Manchurian. A delightful fusion of Indian and Chinese flavors.

dishes.name: Dal Tadka with Jeera Rice
dishes.description: Yellow lentils cooked with spices and tempered with aromatic ghee. Served with cumin-flavored rice. A comforting and satisfying vegetarian meal.

dishes.name: Fish Curry with Steamed Rice
dishes.description: Fish cooked in a spicy and tangy curry, served with steamed rice. A coastal delight for seafood enthusiasts.

dishes.name: Malai Kofta with Chapattis
dishes.description: Deep-fried paneer and vegetable dumplings served in a creamy and rich cashew-based gravy, flavored with aromatic spices along with chapattis

dishes.name: Dal Makhni with naan
dishes.description: A creamy and flavorful lentil curry made with a combination of black lentils (urad dal) and kidney beans (rajma), simmered in a rich tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices.
